name: FishHub
description:
Playthesis

Playthesis is a project born from a university workshop. We decided to create severals mini-games, in order to make this reeducation easier, and bring a piece of happiness in the daily life of the patients.
The aim is to suggest a set of mini-games which could be played with a myoelectric bracelet, able to feel contractions of the biceps and the triceps of the patient.

FishHub

FishHub is the second game made by our team in order to learn a new type of controls and to differentiate them from the previous basic controls used. It initiates maintained contractions.

The player controls a fishing rod from right to left in the same way as before, and with the help of maintained contractions he can throw a hook and recover the fish with a long contractions of the opposite muscle.

Controls: Q: Left - D: Right - Z: Throw hook / Fish

Project page: https://playthesis.fr/Games/FishHub.html
